duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the maintenance and occupancy of commercial properties, such as offices and retail shopping centers.
Collecting rents and initiating default processes when necessary.
Building and maintaining tenant relationships via ongoing communication and in-person visits.
Preparing and auditing annual budgets, continuously monitoring actual expenses and preparing monthly budget variance reports.
Maintaining communication with owners, including monthly financial reporting.

education_certification.credential: Current Real Estate license in the State of Indiana upon hire.
